description: The Lady Fern, Athyrium filix-femina 'Minutissimum', is a truly amazing plant. Its delicate and stunning emerald green fronds provide an elegant display in any setting. It's slow-growing nature and low-maintenance requirements make it an ideal addition to any garden. This fern is incredibly versatile in its ability to tolerate both very wet and very dry conditions, but still prefer partial shade. Although this fern is fairly small, it makes a big impact with its lyrical foliage adding movement and texture to gardens, and is even capable of handling exposed and windy spots. With its miniature size, the Lady Fern is sure to bring charm, grace and beauty to any home.
